name: Match Attack! (itch)
description:
Are you ready!? In this game you will become Fred! A weird tentacle monster because I gave my artist absolutely zero character direction! You will use your unholy arcane powers to fire UNLIMITED MISSILES! Those waves of enemies won't stand a chance! But what could they want? What does Fred possibly have hidden in his slimy, very flexible hand tentacle thingies? 

WARNING! - Must be played in full screen for full mouse control
